post.body: She just heard our girly crush giggles about Barack and Joe and decided to join in. She didn't know why she was laughing even lol
That wasn't Valerie, that was Betty laughing ROFLOL!!
How dare you share my PEBO dream with the world. That was totally confidential!
Hi there friend! You thought you would get passed me didn't you? Muwahaha. Um, just kidding.. friend? you still there? lol
Ok you can have my ketchup packets. I didn't want them to go to waste. Make sure you find a good use for them, ok? Like war paint.
do you have any toothpicks?
I'm sorry but the dish ran away with the last one I had.
No, I'm sorry I don't have any salad dressing, but I have mayo packets. You could mix them w/ the ketchup & make thousand island!
Not sure, but I'll trade you 1 ketchup packet for 2 salt packets. Actually, do you have any pepper? Nevermind, 2 salts will do.
it's just a regular straw. I'm saving the krazy ones for when I break out of here later this afternoon :)
Yeah, I'm trying to decide if I should save the ketchup packets from last week or throw them away. How long do they last anyways?
I miss you my bestest buddy :)
it's cold outside isn't it?! Weeee!
Ok, this breaktime is over. Bye bye :(
drinking diet dr. pepper thru a straw....
(Fortune Cookie reads..) Night People: "Anyone who goes to bed the same day they get up is a quitter." Guess that makes me a winner.
I just realized that if I need some tape I have to open a drawer. Moving tape back to the desktop....
I'm caught up with work now. I moved my pencil holder from the left side of my desk to the right, & put the tape dispenser in my top drawer.
I have some work to do, but for some reason I'm hypnotized by the Twitterverse... snapping out of it, and back to work. bye bye Twitteh!
A real go getter, yep, that's me. :o)~
